Siaosi Tulua murder: Prison ordered for man who broke into Clover Park, South Auckland home, shot occupant https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/siaosi-tulua-murder-prison-ordered-for-man-who-broke-into-clover-park-south-auckland-home-shot-occupant/ NHHCNBYYTRGYZCFIKJ4ZJYOJF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/siaosi-tulua-murder-prison-ordered-for-man-who-broke-into-clover-park-south-auckland-home-shot-occupant/ NHHCNBYYTRGYZCFIKJ4ZJYOJF4/ Craig KapitanIt's been five years since the defendant murdered Tulua. He still can't be named. Sun, 11 Aug 2024 06:00:00 +0000 A 26-year-old with ongoing interim name suppression appears in the High Court at Auckland for sentencing, nine months after a jury found him guilty of murdering Siaosi Tulua in April 2019. The defendant had broken into Tulua’s Clover Park home with intent to rob him, firing the fatal shot as Tulua’s 6-year-old son slept nearby. Photo / Craig Kapitan

Sun, 11 Aug 2024 05:52:26 +0000 Staveley Ice skating rink in Mid Canterbury. Photo / Facebook
Northland man arrested after armed police, dog squad execute search warrant; firearm, meth seized at address https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-man-arrested-after-armed-police-dog-squad-execute-search-warrant-firearm-meth-seized-at-address/B35IX4DOP5FARP5YP2YAJZA67I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-man-arrested-after-armed-police-dog-squad-execute-search-warrant-firearm-meth-seized-at-address/B35IX4DOP5FARP5YP2YAJZA67I/ The man had several warrants out for his arrest for serious offences. Sun, 11 Aug 2024 05:49:49 +0000 The search warrant last night involved the Armed Offenders Squad, police Eagle helicopter, dog units and CIB.
